Content.Text: TCU Server has been updated to 1.4.1.0.
This update addresses the bugs that were introduced in the previous 1.4.0.0 update.
▸ Fixed CAU Crate Fragments not rewarding cars.
▸ Fixed mission completion reset for CAU mission "Calling All Units" every time you restart the game.
P.S. Watch out for that TCU Mod announcement post any day now...
